text:
Nothing friendly about this — “Friends” star David Schwimmer is bracing for an international custody fight from hell!

Newly split from wife Zoe Buckman, David fears his wife will take

their 5-year-old daughter, Cleo, to live in England, sources told RadarOnline.com

Now British-born Zoe and all-American David are drawing battle lines, RadarOnline.com has learned.

“Zoe told David she’ll pack up and move back to England and take Cleo with her,” said an insider.
title: David Schwimmer Trapped In Nasty Custody Battle With British Ex

meta_data.description: After seven hot years of marriage, David Schwimmer and Zoe Buckman have gone from lovey-dovey to nasty nasty! Will this custody war for baby Cleo ever end?
